name: Tony Stark (Iron Man)
description: Tony Stark is a genius inventor and the CEO of Stark Industries. After being kidnapped, he builds the Iron Man suit to escape and becomes a superhero.
fact: Tony Stark's AI assistant, JARVIS, later becomes Vision.

name: Steve Rogers (Captain America)
description: Steve Rogers is a World War II veteran who was enhanced to the peak of human potential by an experimental serum. He wields a virtually indestructible shield.
fact: Captain America's shield is made of Vibranium.

name: Thor
description: Thor is the Norse God of Thunder from Asgard. He wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir, which grants him the ability to fly and manipulate weather.
fact: Thor's hammer, Mjolnir, can only be lifted by those deemed worthy.

name: Natasha Romanoff (Black Widow)
description: Natasha Romanoff is a highly trained spy and former KGB assassin who becomes a key member of the Avengers.
fact: Black Widow has no superhuman powers but is an expert in martial arts and espionage.

name: Bruce Banner (Hulk)
description: Bruce Banner is a scientist who transforms into the Hulk, a giant green-skinned being with immense strength, when he is angered or stressed.
fact: The Hulk's strength increases proportionally with his anger.

name: Clint Barton (Hawkeye)
description: Clint Barton is a master archer and a member of the Avengers. He is known for his exceptional marksmanship and tactical skills.
fact: Hawkeye uses a specialized bow with various trick arrows.

name: Peter Parker (Spider-Man)
description: Peter Parker is a young superhero with spider-like abilities, including wall-crawling, super strength, and spider-sense.
fact: Spider-Man's web-shooters are custom-built devices that allow him to shoot webs on command.

name: T'Challa (Black Panther)
description: T'Challa is the king of Wakanda, a technologically advanced African nation. He wields the Vibranium suit and possesses enhanced abilities.
fact: Black Panther's suit absorbs and redistributes kinetic energy.

name: Scott Lang (Ant-Man)
description: Scott Lang is a former thief who becomes Ant-Man, a superhero capable of shrinking to the size of an ant while retaining his strength.
fact: Ant-Man can communicate with and control ants.

name: Carol Danvers (Captain Marvel)
description: Carol Danvers is a former Air Force pilot who gains superhuman strength, flight, and energy projection after being exposed to alien technology.
fact: Captain Marvel is one of the most powerful heroes in the MCU.

name: Stephen Strange (Doctor Strange)
description: Stephen Strange is a former neurosurgeon who becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, protecting the Earth from mystical threats.
fact: Doctor Strange wields the Eye of Agamotto, which houses the Time Stone.

name: Peter Quill (Star-Lord)
description: Peter Quill is the leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy. He is a skilled pilot and uses advanced technology in his missions.
fact: Star-Lord's helmet was stolen from Yondu Udonta.

name: Gamora
description: Gamora is the last of her species and a formidable warrior. She is a member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
fact: Gamora is known as the 'deadliest woman in the universe.'

name: Drax the Destroyer
description: Drax is a warrior driven by revenge against Thanos for the destruction of his family.
fact: Drax has immense physical strength and resilience.

name: Rocket Raccoon
description: Rocket is a genetically modified raccoon with a penchant for weapons and technology. He is a key member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
fact: Rocket is highly skilled in mechanics and engineering.

name: Groot
description: Groot is a tree-like alien with regenerative abilities. He can only say the phrase 'I am Groot,' which has various meanings.
fact: Groot's appearance can regenerate from almost any damage.

name: Nick Fury
description: Nick Fury is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D. and plays a pivotal role in assembling the Avengers.
fact: Nick Fury's eye patch contains advanced technology.

name: Wanda Maximoff (Scarlet Witch)
description: Wanda Maximoff possesses powerful reality-warping abilities and is a key member of the Avengers.
fact: Scarlet Witch's powers are enhanced by the Mind Stone.

name: Vision
description: Vision is an android created with the Mind Stone, possessing superhuman abilities and a strong moral compass.
fact: Vision can manipulate his density, allowing him to phase through objects or become incredibly dense.

name: Bucky Barnes (Winter Soldier)
description: Bucky Barnes is Steve Rogers' childhood friend who becomes the brainwashed assassin Winter Soldier.
fact: Winter Soldier has a cybernetic arm that enhances his combat abilities.

name: Sam Wilson (Falcon)
description: Sam Wilson is a former pararescueman who uses a specialized winged suit to fly and fight as Falcon.
fact: Falcon's wings are equipped with drones that assist in combat.

name: James Rhodes (War Machine)
description: James Rhodes is a close friend of Tony Stark and dons the War Machine armor to fight alongside the Avengers.
fact: War Machine's armor is heavily armed with advanced weaponry.

name: Hope van Dyne (Wasp)
description: Hope van Dyne is a scientist and superhero who uses the Wasp suit to shrink and fly, possessing enhanced strength and agility.
fact: Wasp can communicate with and control insects.
